SummaryEnglish: Kunieda Kei is a young and popular TV announcer, whose public and private personas are extremely different. In his professional life he's considered perfect, while on the inside he's constantly cursing all the incompetence around him. No one knows this secret of his. However, a certain circumstance allows Tsuzuki Ushio, an animation artist, to discover Kei's hidden side.
Aliases: Yes ka No ka Hanbun ka
